pr_title: DB-9369 Remove schema inference for Parquet tables

timeline.message:
DB-9369 Remove schema inference for Parquet tables

Make Decimal width computation consistent
Implement extract weekday in native spark

timeline.bodyText: There is an else path also with (rightType.isStringTypeId() && leftType.isNumericTypeId()), why not use computeMaxWidth() for that path also?
timeline.author: yxia92

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I missed that branch.
replies.author: dgomezferro

timeline.bodyText: Is a %s in the format string?
timeline.author: yxia92

replies.bodyText:
This was badly broken sorry, I'm not sure why I didn't catch while manually testing on the service.
I've fixed it and added a test that uses parquet External tables to force this codepath.
Again, thanks for the catch!
replies.author: dgomezferro

timeline.message: DB-9369 Disable "extract week" and update IT

timeline.bodyText:
i made some changes in #3486 to assure these temporary files are removed again. i'm waiting on this review, so if your change is in before mine i might have to adjust this as well. (this is more a note for myself to adjust this as well).
for now, tablePath.deleteOnExit(); should be sufficient
timeline.author: martinrupp
